description: To provide scholarship assistance to students within the College of Education Professional Studies with a major in the Department of Kinesiology and Health Studies. Eligibility Requirements Students with a major in the KHS Department Preference given to a student athlete In a short essay, please describe your academic and/or career goals and how receiving this scholarship will help achieve your goals. Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
